price: 11਼ ਉਹ ਉਸ ਜੰਨਤੇ-ਫਿਰਦੌਸ ਦੇ ਵਾਰਸ ਹੋਣਗੇ ਜਿੱਥੇ ਉਹ ਸਦਾ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ।
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
